headline: Former ATL Dem turned MAGA Mascot Vernon Jones Runs for Congress
author: Keith Reed
sentences: With the baggage of accusations of intimidation of women and even rapehe was never charged or convictedduring his time as Dekalb County CEO, and after flipping parties from Democrat to a Black mascot on the Trump MAGA team, it's not like Jones can go home again politically.
